item.description:
PLEASE RSVP YES WITH ONLY ONE MEETUP GROUP THIS ENSURES AN ACCURATE COUNT

 

Fellow happy hourer and Social Fun organizer, Biagio, has arranged yet another Mix and Mingle....which is a joint event of several meetup groups at Hard Rock Cafe (near Faneuil Hall) 22-24 Clinton Street Boston, MA 02109 617 424-7635

Hard Rock link

 

FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE

NEW LOCATION : HARD ROCK CAFE BOSTON

FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE

 

Password for entry is SOCIAL FUN

 

PLEASE BE RESPECTFUL TO EACH OTHER AND DRINK RESPONSIBLY!

 

Recommended mode of transporatiion MBTA and/or taxi

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a five (5) minute walk away.

The Cavern Club which is located inside the Hard Rock Cafe is an ideal spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for as many as 300 members on Friday, April 15, 2011.

Here's what's available

  1. From 6:30 PM until 7:30 PM ONLY, enjoy FREE appetizers such as chicken tupelo, spring rolls, haystack salads and pulled pork sandwich. So if you want some FREE grub get there before 7:30 PM. There will be a Social Fun sign identifying our food.
  2. Three hours of FREE pool. Two of the three pool tables will be reserved for Social Fun.
  3. Reserved seating and FREE live music.
  4. Free cover to REWIRED (DJ dance night) from 10 PM until 2 AM. At 9 PM the Cavern Club tables and chairs will be removed to make room for dancing!
  5. $3 Sam Adams Seasonal Bottled Beer

EVERYONE, If you're able, show you're appreciation to Biagio by contributing a dollar or two to him for taking the time and energy to set up this FREE FUN time. Here's a link with Biagio's photo http://photos3.meetup... so you can find and thank him.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

Mix + Mingles have been known to reach capacity before 8 PM, so get there EARLY. If you arrive after 8 PM you may have to wait in a line before being allowed in the Cavern Club. Great reason to get there EARLY.

 

The Meetup Groups are:

Social Fun

World is Our Playground

Boston Volunteer

Beantown and Beyond

Boston Euro Social

 

This is NOT a Singles party. So anyone who is at least 21 (remember to bring identification) can attend, which means couples are also welcome. Let's get to know one another, socialize, and dance.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Cavern Club which is a private room inside the Hard Rock Cafe
item.why: FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE FREE
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle at a NEW VENUE - Hard Rock Cafe on Friday April 15th
